name: Awesome Donut Cake Pop Dessert Breakfast Shop Maker
name_original: Awesome Donut Cake Pop Dessert Breakfast Shop Maker
description:
We enjoyed making the donut maker game. So we are bringing you, the ultimate Donut Cake Pop Maker!!

Brought to you by Top Crazy Games, bringing you the best cooking and baking game with all of your favorite donut cake pop flavors and recipes. Play and make your Donut Cake Pop today!!

Features:
- Ring Donut Pops or Filled Donut Pops! What do you like?
- Choose your favorite flavors
- Mix ingredients
- Decorate with many and many choices
- EAT IT! EAT IT AGAIN AND AGAIN!

Dozens to choose from:
- Flavors
- Decorations: Creams, frosting, fruits, chocolates, sprinkles, candies, all savory goods
- and More!!!!!

Play it for yourself. Who doesnt like to bake for the sweet tooth!

PLEASE NOTE:
- This game is free to play but in app purchases charges real money within the app . You can adjust your device settings to deactivate in app purchasing.

Private Policy:
http://www.topcrazygames.com/privatepolicy/privatepolicy.txt
